Shokaract is hit from behind. Shokaract spins around and fires 2 missiles,
including the big one, at Hiss.

The Mafia are all hit and decide to retaliate with a combined shooting. They
all draw their machine guns and fire away at the Oblitercons. Aproximatley
20 bullets from each of them and there are 5 of them...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, October 13, 2000 6:22 PM
Subject: Re: Retaliation


> GTG. I'll post again in an hour.
>
> ::The Oblitercons::
>
> With a yell, Pyro erupts from the trees, the giant black tank riding
> toward the nearest bot, Gigas, and firing fireballs. Dark One flies
> in from above, rapid laser fire streaming out toward Horn Drill.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Riding behind Pyro (in the path cleared by him), Scavanger and
> Breakdown arrive at the scene, Scavanger opening fire on Beholder and
> Breakdown firing two missiles at Grenade.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> In robot mode, Hiss emerges from the woods after Scavanger, firing at
> Shockaract.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Diskus is bounced back and forth and one of his wings are damaged.
> He
> > flutters in the air with one wing trying to stay up. Shokaract
> takes the
> > shots and fires back at Serpentor with 2 missiles. The Mafia member
> Horn
> > Drill notices Chaos. Gigas fires 2 missiles at Chaos. Horn Drill
> fires 2
> > drills at Chaos. Kracken fires 4 bolt beams at Chaos. Beholder
> fires 4 optic
> > blasts at Chaos. Grenade shoots 2 fireballs at Chaos...
>
>
>
>
